TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Paudadan, title = Paudadan, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paudadan} }

S.FORM: Paudadan Itiniay i Xincheng Cen no Hualien ko Paudadan a niyaro', 254 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 727 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 72 ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 526 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 28 ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 201 ko tamdaw. O pa sin to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis48 , 1 , Bunun4 , Tayal4 , Truku12 , Kebalan1 , roma3 .
